items.description: An easy Mexican breakfast that'll keep you going all morning, it's got everything you need to pep up your plate

items.description: A super quick version of this flavoursome Thai green curry with just 4 ingredients. Our simple prawn and coconut soup is ideal for a midweek meal

items.description: Try this easy, sticky Asian-style teriyaki chicken for a speedy weeknight supper – it takes just 20 minutes to make! Serve it with sticky rice and steamed greens

items.title: Quick & easy tiramisu
items.description: Condensed milk is the secret to this super snappy Italian dessert. Coffee and chocolate are a classic combo, simply layer them up and enjoy

items.description: Try our easy Thai prawn curry on a busy weeknight. This quick dinner is ready in under 20 minutes and flavoured with warming red Thai curry paste

items.description: Pasta, sauce, and sausages, what could be a better combination? The sausage meat adds great flavour to a simple dish

items.title: Malabar prawns
items.description: Make one of Kerala’s staple dishes – malabar prawns, a speciality of the South Indian coast. They're quick and easy to prepare and full of distinct flavours

items.title: Ravioli with walnuts, goat’s cheese & cavolo nero sauce
items.description: Make this pasta dish using lasagne sheets and a homemade goat's cheese paste. If you have time, it's worth using freshly shelled walnuts for a sweeter flavour

items.description: A classic in a flash, you can also use beef. Either way - it's a winner
